document.full_text: lauren alaina may have won the hearts of "american idol" judges with her final performances, but tv viewers were more interested in "dancing with the stars," according to early ratings figures for the two big rival shows.
document.title: scotty in with "idol" chance, lauren wins over judges
lines_and_colors: lauren alaina may have won the hearts of "american idol" judges with her final performances, but tv viewers were more interested in "dancing with the stars," according to early ratings figures for the two big rival shows.
